premise:
Twitter fiction: 21 authors try their hand at 140-character novels
We challenged well-known writers – from Ian Rankin and Helen Fielding to Jeffrey Archer and Jilly Cooper – to come up with a story of up to 140 characters. This is their stab at Twitter fiction

questionsAndAnswers.question: Geoff Dyer
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I know I said that if I lived to 100 I'd not regret what happened last night. But I woke up this morning and a century had passed. Sorry.

questionsAndAnswers.question: James Meek
questionsAndAnswers.answer: He said he was leaving her. "But I love you," she said. "I know," he said. "Thanks. It's what gave me the strength to love somebody else."

questionsAndAnswers.question: Jackie Collins
questionsAndAnswers.answer: She smiled, he smiled back, it was lust at first sight, but then she discovered he was married, too bad it couldn't go anywhere.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Ian Rankin
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I opened the door to our flat and you were standing there, cleaver raised. Somehow you'd found out about the photos. My jaw hit the floor.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Blake Morrison
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Blonde, GSOH, 28. Great! Ideal mate! Fix date. Tate. Nervous wait. She's late. Doh, just my fate. Wrong candidate. Blond – and I'm straight.

questionsAndAnswers.question: David Lodge
questionsAndAnswers.answer: "Your money or your life!" "I'm sorry, my dear, but you know it would kill me to lose my money," said the partially deaf miser to his wife.

questionsAndAnswers.question: AM Homes
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Sometimes we wonder why sorrow so heavy when happiness is like helium.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Sophie Hannah
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I had land, money. For each rejected novel I built one house. Ben had to drown because he bought Plot 15. My 15th book? The victim drowned.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Andrew O'Hagan
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Clyde stole a lychee and ate it in the shower. Then his brother took a bottle of pills believing character is just a luxury. God. The twins.

questionsAndAnswers.question: AL Kennedy
questionsAndAnswers.answer: It's good that you're busy. Not great. Good, though. But the silence, that's hard. I don't know what it means: whether you're OK, if I'm OK.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Jeffrey Archer
questionsAndAnswers.answer: "It's a miracle he survived," said the doctor. "It was God's will," said Mrs Schicklgruber. "What will you call him?" "Adolf," she replied.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Anne Enright
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The internet ate my novel, but this is much more fun #careerchange #nolookingback oh but #worldsosilentnow Hey!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Patrick Neate
questionsAndAnswers.answer: ur profile pic: happy – smiling & smoking. ur last post: "home!" ur hrt gave out @35. ur profile undeleted 6 months on. ur epitaph: "home!"

questionsAndAnswers.question: Hari Kunzru
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I'm here w/ disk. Where ru? Mall too crowded to see. I don't feel safe. What do you mean you didn't send any text? Those aren't your guys?

questionsAndAnswers.question: SJ Watson
questionsAndAnswers.answer: She thanks me for the drink, but says we're not suited. I'm a little "intense". So what? I followed her home. She hasn't seen anything yet.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Helen Fielding
questionsAndAnswers.answer: OK. Should not have logged on to your email but suggest if going on marriedaffair.com don't use our children's names as password.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Simon Armitage
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Blaise Pascal didn't tweet and neither did Mark Twain. When it came to writing something short & sweet neither Blaise nor Mark had the time.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Charlie Higson
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Jack was sad in the orphanage til he befriended a talking rat who showed him a hoard of gold under the floor. Then the rat bit him & he died.

questionsAndAnswers.question: India Knight
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Soften, my arse. I'm a geezer. I'm a rock-hard little bastard. Until I go mushy overnight for you, babe. #pears
